Job Posting:172509 - Position: W26 Mobile Developer Intern (Winter/January 2026, 4-8 Months) 172509 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 09/11/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 09/03/2025 11:45 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Geotab 2440 Winston Park Dr Oakville L6H 7V2 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description Who we are: 2026 - Winter W26 Mobile Developer Intern (Winter/January 2026, 4-8 Months) 172509 Co-op Position Various Locations, ON Canada 4 or 8 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Geotab ® is a global leader in IoT and connected transportation and certified "Great Place to Work™." We are a company of diverse and talented individuals who work together to help businesses grow and succeed, and increase the safety and sustainability of our communities. Geotab is advancing security, connecting commercial vehicles to the internet and providing web-based analytics to help customers better manage their fleets. Geotab's open platform and Geotab Marketplace ®, offering hundreds of third-party solution options, allows both small and large businesses to automate operations by integrating vehicle data with their other data assets. Processing billions of data points a day, Geotab leverages data analytics and machine learning to improve productivity, optimize fleets through the reduction of fuel consumption, enhance driver safety and achieve strong compliance to regulatory changes. Our team is growing and we're looking for people who follow their passion, think differently and want to make an impact. Ours is a fast paced, ever changing environment. Geotabbers accept that challenge and are willing to take on new tasks and activities - ones that may not always be described in the initial job description. Join us for a fulfilling career with opportunities to innovate, great benefits, and our fun and inclusive work culture. Reach your full potential with Geotab. To see what it's like to be a Geotabber, check out our blog and follow us @InsideGeotab on Instagram. Join our talent network to learn more about job opportunities and company news. Who you are: We are always looking for amazing talent who can contribute to our growth and deliver results! Geotab is seeking an Mobile Developer Intern who will develop/test/review android and iOS code that will be deployed to the app stores and used by our customers. If you love technology, and are keen to join an industry leader - we would love to hear from you! What you'll do: As a Mobile Developer Intern, your key area of responsibility will be: • Developing new features and fixing bugs in our mobile products. • Contributing to team meetings so that we continue to get better. • Collaborating with the team on design discussions. • Reviewing the code of your team members. Ensuring a high level of quality in the product through automated and manual testing. • To be successful in this role you will be a self-starter with strong written and verbal communication skills, and have the ability to The opportunity: quickly understand complex, technical concepts. • 4- 8 month work-term beginning January 2026. • Full-time, paid internship: Monday - Friday, 37.5hrs/week. • Your first week at Geotab begins with 'GEO Launch' - a one-week Employee Orientation. Click here to learn more! •How you'll make an impact: Learn more about the Geotab Campus Program here. • Developing new features and fixing bugs in our mobile products. • Contributing to team meetings so that we continue to get better. • Collaborating with the team on design discussions. • Reviewing the code of your team members. Ensuring a high level of quality in the product through automated and manual testing. • Job Requirements What you'll bring to the role: • Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Math or related field • Proficiency in JAVA/Kotlin or Objective-C/Swift Experience developing mobile applications iOS/Android • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website.
